-- | longest common substring
--   
--   algorithms for finding the longest common substring in a set of
--   documents
@package string-similarity
@version 0.1.0.0

module Data.List.SlowSubstring
longestSubstring :: (Eq a, Ord a) => [a] -> [a] -> [a]
sharedPrefix :: (Eq a, Ord a) => [a] -> [a] -> [a]

module Data.List.CommonSubstring

-- | This is the suffixtree based implementation. | If there are multiple
--   longest substrings, which one is returned | is undefined.
longestSubstring :: (Eq a, Ord a) => [a] -> [a] -> [a]
